name: Night Time
description: Darkness with artificial or moonlight, deep shadows and nocturnal atmosphere

prompt.base: Night time, darkness, nocturnal atmosphere, artificial lighting, moonlight, deep shadows, night sky, evening darkness, after-dark mood
prompt.positive: night time, darkness, nocturnal atmosphere, artificial lights, moonlight, deep shadows, night sky, stars, evening darkness, after-dark, city lights, street lamps, night mood
prompt.negative: daylight, sunshine, morning light, bright atmosphere, daytime, golden hour, afternoon sun

technical.shadow_quality: Deep, dramatic shadows with selective lighting
technical.atmospheric_effects: Darkness, stars, moon, artificial light sources

variations.name: Moonlit Night
variations.modifier: full moon, natural moonlight, silvery glow, romantic night, lunar illumination

variations.name: Urban Night
variations.modifier: city lights, neon signs, street lamps, metropolitan night, artificial illumination

variations.name: Dark Night
variations.modifier: minimal light, deep darkness, starlight only, mysterious night, shadowy atmosphere

examples: A city street at night with street lamps and neon signs, nocturnal atmosphere, artificial lighting
A moonlit landscape with silvery glow, night sky with stars, romantic nocturnal mood
